message: What filetype should I use for html/php templates to get correct syntax highlighting? Can I mix filetypes?
It works just fine with erb (embedded ruby in HTML)
@ranza to the best of my knowledge when using the php filetype you get highlighting for HTML as well.
sure but all my shortcuts i normally have when filetype is html doesnt work
for erb files I use the following:   set filetype=eruby.html   and that gives me what I'm looking for.  I'd imagine you can do something like set filetype = php.html and that would work too
@mikefarmer cool, didn't know that you could do that. Something new every day.
Nice! Seems like the first type will set the syntax as well. so php.html would use the php syntax but be aware of html specific items as well.
Oh wow that is brilliant. Thanks @mikefarmer
